items.title: Counterspell (Foil Etched) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Instant
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {U}{U}
Counter target spell.

items.title: Soul Snare (Foil Etched) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Enchantment
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {W}
{W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.
"Shackle the body, and the anguish lasts only until death. Shackle the soul, and the wicked can be punished for eternity." —Inquisitor Laerin

items.title: Solitary Confinement (Foil Etched) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Enchantment
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{W}
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

items.title: Karmic Guide (Foil Etched) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Angel Spirit
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {3}{W}{W}
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

items.title: Angelic Curator (Foil Etched) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Angel Spirit
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {1}{W}
Flying, protection from artifacts
"Do not treat your people as you treat your artifacts. Let them go, and they will live; seal them here, and they will die." —Urza, to Radiant

items.title: Blacksmith's Skill (Retro) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Instant
Rarity: Common
Cost: {W}
Target permanent gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Before he was subjugated by demonic forces, Dakkon was a master smith of unrivaled artistry.

items.title: Timeless Witness (Sketch) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Human Shaman
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {2}{G}{G}
When Timeless Witness enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Eternalize {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Shaman with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)
Intent: We'd like to re-imagine the Eternal Witness as an initiate on Amonkhet.

items.title: Blossoming Calm (Sketch) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Instant
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {W}
You gain hexproof until your next turn. You gain 2 life.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
Mood: A spell that protects her from her enemies.

items.title: Nykthos Paragon (Sketch) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Enchantment Creature — Human Soldier
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {4}{W}{W}
Whenever you gain life, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Do this only once each turn.
Action: Start with 190C and design a spirit known as an Eidolon that resembles a human solider carrying a large shield.

items.title: Ornithopter of Paradise (Retro) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Artifact Creature — Thopter
Rarity: Common
Cost: {2}
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
"Through even our darkest days, we must never cease creating. Each new invention brings value to the world, be it beauty, utility, or both." —Rashmi, aether-seer

items.title: Sojourner's Companion [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Artifact Creature — Salamander
Rarity: Common
Cost: {7}
Affinity for artifacts
Artifact landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an artifact land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
Before Phyrexia's corruption, many of Mirrodin's creatures were more curious than cruel.

items.title: Myr Scrapling [Modern Horizons 2]

Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Artifact Creature — Myr
Rarity: Common
Cost: {1}
Sacrifice Myr Scrapling: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
"They're useful creatures, but quite replaceable. I find it best not to get too attached." —Pontifex, elder researcher

items.title: Smell Fear [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Sorcery
Rarity: Common
Cost: {1}{G}
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
"It's fun when they run a little." —Wasitora, Nekoru queen

items.title: Duskshell Crawler [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Insect
Rarity: Common
Cost: {1}{G}
When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.

items.title: Goblin Anarchomancer (Retro) [Modern Horizons 2]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Goblin Shaman
Rarity: Common
Cost: {R}{G}
Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.
A good Gruul shaman can work a whole clan into a frenzy. A great one will wait until the enemy's nearby.

Type: Instant
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {1}{G}

items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Creature — Goblin
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {3}{R}
Whenever Goblin Traprunner attacks, flip three coins. For each flip you win, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.
The best traprunners know exactly where to step. The others . . . do their best.

items.title: Combine Chrysalis (Sketch) [Modern Horizons 2]

Type: Artifact
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {G}{U}
Creature tokens you control have flying.
{2}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a token: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
Action: Please design a Simic device that turns smaller creatures into big flying beasts.

Rarity: Rare
Cost: {3}{B}{B}

Tide Shaper gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

Set: Modern Horizons 2
Type: Artifact Creature — Sphinx
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {7}{W}{U}

Flying
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Cost: {B}{B}
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

Type: Artifact
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{G}

Rarity: Rare

Rarity: Rare
Cost: {1}{G}{U}
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

{T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

Rarity: Rare
Cost: {U}

Time moves in mysterious ways.
